ShellScripts.CheckUserAndKeyScript: grep -c '^{0}:' /etc/passwd; cd /home; if [ ! -d "{0}" ]; then echo 0; fi; cd {0}; if [ ! -d ".ssh" ]; then echo 0; fi; cd .ssh; if [ ! -e "authorized_keys" ]; then echo 0; fi;
ShellScripts.StoreKeyScript: if [ $(grep -c '^{0}:' /etc/passwd) == 0 ]; then sudo useradd -e `date -d "{3} days" +"%Y-%m-%d"` -m {0}; chmod 700 /home/{0}; fi; cd /home/{0}; if [ ! -d ".ssh" ]; then sudo mkdir .ssh; cd .ssh; else cd .ssh; fi; rm -rf /home/{0}/.ssh/*; cd /home/{2}/SSHConfigurator/SSHConfigurator/wwwroot/temp-keys; sudo cp {1} /home/{0}/.ssh; cd /home/{0}/.ssh; sudo mv {1} authorized_keys
